Container.Name: Sure-Web
Container.Overview:
Sure is a community-driven fork of the former Maybe Finance application, continuing its mission to help users manage personal finances by tracking expenses, budgeting, and supporting wealth management. Note: "Maybe" is a trademark of Maybe Finance, Inc..
This is the 1 of 2 containers required to run Sure finance; **please review the additional requirements.**
Post Installation: To ensure correct user permissions for the app-storage folder, run 'chown -R 1000:1000 /mnt/user/appdata/sure/app-storage' after the initial startup.
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: sure sure-web sure-finance sure-budget personal-finance-management expense-tracking wealth-overview budget-planner open-source-finance self-hosted-finance financial-planning finance-app
Container.Requires: This is container 1 of 2 needed to run Sure finance, runs alongside //Sure-Worker\\. Requires a //Postgres\\ database and //Redis\\. Check the Sure documentation for more information: https://github.com/we-promise/sure/blob/main/docs/hosting/docker.md

Config.Name: Config data
Config.Description: Config data for application. Should be the same dir as Sure Worker.

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: Secret key. Run `openssl rand -hex 64` to generate a secret

Config.Name: Redis - URL
Config.Description: The Redis host URL. Suggested: redis://{YOUR-REDIS-IP}:6379/1

Config.Name: OpenAI API Token
Config.Description: Optional - NOTE: enabling OpenAI will incur costs when you use AI-related features in the app (chat, rules). Make sure you have set appropriate spend limits on your account before adding this.

Config.Name: Is Self-Hosted
Config.Description: Is the application self-hosted. Not recommended to change.

Config.Name: Enforce SSL
Config.Description: Enforce SSL connections. Not recommended to change.

Config.Description: Assume SSL connections. Not recommended to change.
